Other budget hotel is still better.

This led to a heated exchange where Zai became unprofessional, raising his voice and telling me not to speak to him anymore.

When I clarify if I will get my full refund & I would like to cancel this booking. Which initially the Indian female staff offered. He continued to not answer me & tell me to directly speak to Agoda. He will not answer me.

Adding to the confusion, the female staff promised a free cancellation, but then later said there would be a one-night penalty, because we already took the keys and went into the room. which was never mentioned during check-in.

When we requested a refund, we were told to contact Agoda directly, even though the staff member had originally said she could provide a full refund immediately.
